sentences.en: A cynic might list this as a form of economic aid for Allende.
sentences.cn: 想挖苦人的人可以把这些都说成是给予阿连德的某种形式的经援.

sentences.en: A victory for Allende would imperil our interests in the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 阿连德一旦获胜,就将危及我们在西半球的利益.

sentences.en: Allende arrived at the Presidential Palace at 7∶30 A . M. with a heavily armed escort.
sentences.cn: 阿连德于上午七时三十分在重兵护卫下来到总统府.

sentences.en: Allende began uttering threats of violence.
sentences.cn: 阿连德开始扬言要使用武力.

sentences.en: Allende next turned to stifling his domestic opponents.
sentences.cn: 阿连德接着就看手扼杀国内的反对派.

sentences.en: Allende showed his disdain for the Congressional action.
sentences.cn: 阿连德根本不把国会的决议放在眼里.
阿连德与尼克松是在同一时期先后垮台的.

sentences.en: Allende's later martyrdom has obscured his politics.
sentences.cn: 阿连德后来杀身成仁,倒使他的政治色彩不那么显目了.

sentences.en: It had an anti - Allende thrust.
sentences.cn: 它还有一股 反 阿连德的冲动.

sentences.en: Then, on November 9,1971, Allende took on other foreign creditors.
sentences.cn: 接着, 1971年11月9日, 阿连德又向其他外国债权人开了刀.

sentences.en: Through incompetence, conviction, or over - confidence in his manipulative skills, Allende never faced up to that dilemma.
sentences.cn: 由于阿连德领导无方, 墨守信念, 过分相信自己手腕高明, 因此他从未认真对待这种左右为难的局面.

trans.tran_cn: 阿连德(在墨西哥, 西经 100o01' 北纬 25o20')
[地名] [墨西哥、乌拉圭] 阿连德
